effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   If the holder participated in a trainer battle, the trainer earns twice the usual prize money.  This effect applies even if the holder fainted.

    This effect does not stack with any other similar effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Doubles the money earned from a battle. Does not stack with Luck Incense.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせた　ポケモンが　１度でも
戦闘に　顔を　だすと
お金が　２倍　もらえる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It doubles any prize money received
if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Se chi ce l’ha partecipa alla lotta, i guadagni
raddoppiano.

Debe llevarlas un Pokémon. Fortalecen los
movimientos de tipo Siniestro.

Ein Item, das von einem Pokémon getragen wird
und das doppeltes Preisgeld bringt, wenn der
Träger am Kampf teilnimmt.

Objet à tenir. Double l’argent gagné si le porteur
se joint au combat.

지니게 한 포켓몬이
한 번이라도 배틀에 나가면
돈을 2배로 받을 수 있다.

もたせた　ポケモンが　いちどでも
せんとうに　かおを　だすと
おかねが　２ばい　もらえる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It doubles a battle’s prize money if
the holding Pokémon joins in.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It doubles a battle’s prize money if
the holding Pokémon joins in.

si le porteur se joint au combat.

It doubles the battle money if the

battle if the
